dcterms:description: The Rodinia Benchmark Suite is a benchmark suite designed for heterogeneous computing, providing a diverse set of applications to evaluate performance across different architectures.
dcterms:title: Rodinia Benchmark Suite

dcterms:description: The NAS Parallel Benchmarks are a set of benchmarks designed to evaluate the performance of parallel supercomputers, focusing on the performance of computational kernels.
dcterms:title: NAS Parallel Benchmarks

dcterms:creator: R. Hornung
J. Keasler
M. Gokhale
dcterms:description: LULESH (Livermore Unstructured Lagrangian Explicit Shock Hydrodynamics) is a benchmark designed to evaluate the performance of hydrodynamics simulations.
dcterms:title: LULESH (Livermore Unstructured Lagrangian Explicit Shock Hydrodynamics)

dcterms:creator: G. Bronevetsky
J. Gyllenhaal
B. R. De Supinski
dcterms:description: CLOMP (Characterizing OpenMP Application Overheads) is a benchmark suite aimed at accurately characterizing the overheads associated with OpenMP applications.
dcterms:title: CLOMP (Characterizing OpenMP Application Overheads)
